mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`name` FROM sub_stadium s WHERE s.parent_id = #{mainStadium} AND s.`status` = '1'

SELECT id, discount_type AS discountType, main_stadium_id AS mainStadiumId, sub_stadium_id AS subStadiumId, discount_channel AS discountChannel, pay_type AS payType, discount_limit AS discountLimit, DATE(start_time) AS startTime, DATE(end_time) AS endTime FROM discount_configure WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE discount_configure d SET d.`status` = #{status} WHERE d.end_time < NOW() AND d.`status` != '2'
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS id, dt.`name` AS discountType, d.main_stadium_id AS mainStadiumId, d.sub_stadium_id AS subStadiumId, ( CASE d.discount_channel WHEN '0' THEN '线下窗口' WHEN '1' THEN '线上支付' ELSE '' END ) AS discountChannel, p.payment AS payType, d.discount_limit AS discountLimit, DATE(d.start_time) AS startTime, DATE(d.end_time) AS endTime FROM discount_configure d LEFT JOIN discount_type dt ON d.discount_type = dt.id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.id = d.pay_type WHERE d.id = #{id}
SELECT id, `name` AS name FROM main_stadium WHERE id = #{id} AND `status` = '1'
SELECT s.id, s.`name` AS name FROM sub_stadium s WHERE s.id = #{id} AND s.`status` = '1'
